about_the_game:
Dark Deception Chapter 5 is the final chapter in the Shattered Ring Arc. Face off against multiple new nightmares in the final confrontation with Malak and his army of monsters.

Dark Deception mixes the fast-paced style of classic arcade games with fun horror game design. Trapped in a dark world full of nightmarish mazes and anxiety-inducing monsters, the only way out is to face the darkness and find a way to survive.
detailed_description:
Dark Deception Chapter 5 is the final chapter in the Shattered Ring Arc. Face off against multiple new nightmares in the final confrontation with Malak and his army of monsters.

Dark Deception mixes the fast-paced style of classic arcade games with fun horror game design. Trapped in a dark world full of nightmarish mazes and anxiety-inducing monsters, the only way out is to face the darkness and find a way to survive.

name: Dark Deception Chapter 5

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-bit, Windows 8.1, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4330/AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 3GB/ AMD Radeon R7 370 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 60fps low settings at 1080p
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: 64-bit Windows 7, Windows 8.1, or Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Corei5-6600K/ AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 2070 8GB/ AMD Radeon RX 5700 XT 8GB
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 60fps high settings at 1080p

short_description: Dark Deception mixes the fast-paced style of classic arcade games with fun horror game design. Trapped in a dark world full of nightmarish mazes and anxiety-inducing monsters, the only way out is to face the darkness and find a way to survive.
